reviews.review_msg: Smart man but his quizzes get harder and harder. If you're thinking of doing grad school you should definitely take his class. He can give you lots of advice and he's very knowledgeable!

Rob is a great person and he's really nice and funny. I enjoyed the course, I learned a lot but his quizzes get harder and harder and it seems like he doesn't scale at all. His lectures can be boring sometimes but he's very intelligent!
